function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of integration between social, environmental scientists and engineers in developing a framework of health in the built environment","Impact":"Increased health risks in the built environment","Mitigation":"Collaboration and integration between social, environmental scientists and engineers","Technologies":"Integrated data analysis and communication platforms","People":"Social and environmental scientists, engineers","Owner":"Researchers, policymakers, and building designers"},{"Description":"Gap in translating science-based evidence and solutions to reduce health risks in the built environment","Impact":"Continued presence of health risks in built environments","Mitigation":"Developing effective communication strategies and frameworks for knowledge translation","Technologies":"Data visualization tools, communication technologies","People":"Health researchers, policymakers, engineers","Owner":"Research institutions, government entities"},{"Description":"Lack of conceptualization of built environmental justice and health inequalities","Impact":"Exacerbation of health disparities in the built environment","Mitigation":"Development of frameworks for environmental justice and health equality in built environments","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis tools, community engagement platforms","People":"Health equity advocates, policymakers, engineers","Owner":"Community organizations, government entities"}]}
